task.summary: Creating the HTML photos table on Photos.php page
Adding the photo src. Adding textarea for the upload page for photo description.
Adding the function that builds the photo_path.
Adding caption, alternate_text to photo and finishing edit display and save.
Installing TinyMCE editor and setting the photos thumbnail on photos page.
Adding image_src im the database on users table. Creating the delete user functionality.
Setting Up Image Upload for User
